Name: salivary gland carcinoma
Definition: A salivary gland cancer that has_material_basis_in epithelial cells.

Name: pleomorphic adenoma carcinoma
Definition: An autosomal recessive disease that has_material_basis_in rare mutations in two DNA excision repair proteins

Name: epithelial-myoepithelial carcinoma
Definition: A clear cell adenocarcinoma that is located_in the urethra.
Synonym: Clear cell adenocarcinoma of the urethra

Name: sublingual gland cancer
Definition: A  salivary gland cancer that is located_in the sublingual gland.
Synonym: malignant tumor of the Sublingual gland

Name: parotid gland cancer
Definition: A salivary gland cancer that is located_in the parotid gland.

Name: obsolete Burkitt's tumor or lymphoma involving lymph nodes of inguinal region and lower limb
Definition: A salivary gland cancer that is located_in the parotid gland.
Synonym: Burkitt's lymphoma of lymph nodes of inguinal region and lower limb (disorder)

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's paragranuloma involving lymph nodes of head
Definition: A salivary gland cancer that is located_in the parotid gland.
Synonym: Hodgkin's paragranuloma of lymph nodes of head

Name: obsolete reticulosarcoma involving lymph nodes of head
Definition: A salivary gland cancer that is located_in the parotid gland.
Synonym: Reticulosarcoma of lymph nodes of head

Name: obsolete Hodgkin's lymphoma
Definition: A salivary gland cancer that is located_in the parotid gland.

Name: submandibular gland cancer
Definition: A X-linked recessive disease that is characterized by abnormal immune system function and a reduced ability to form blood clots resulting from a decrease in the number and size of blood cell fragments involved in clotting (microthrombocytopenia).
Synonym: malignant tumor of the Submandibular gland
